citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The facility employs an attending veterinarian on a part-time basis and does not currently have a written program of
veterinary care documenting this arrangement. A written program of veterinary care is important for ensuring veterinary
care is provided for the animals on-site. Correct by September 14, 2023, by documenting a written program of veterinary
care in collaboration with the attending veterinarian.

There is one enclosure housing two black bears not contained within an 8ft perimeter fence. A perimeter fence must be
strong and tall enough to prevent unauthorized people and animals, and to act as a secondary containment system in the
event that an animal escapes from its primary enclosure. Correct by maintaining a perimeter fence around the enclosure
that is at least 8 feet tall and 3 feet away from the primary enclosures, or by obtaining a written approval by the
Administrator. Correct by November 3, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
